job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Title: Devops Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location: USA, Remote</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: Contract </strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Note: Client is only looking for US Citizens</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Required Skills/Experience</strong></p><p>The minimum requirements for this role are as follows:</p><ul><li>2+ years of experience as DevOps engineer, SRE, software engineer, or system engineer</li><li>Proven programming skills (Python, Linux Shell, Java, Go, etc.)</li><li>Hands-on experience in Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, Ansible, Terraform and Linux OS is required</li><li>Hands-on experience with the following technologies is a definite plus</li><li>AWS GovCloud and services such as S3, ECS, EC2, CloudFront, Lambda, Route 53, ElastiCache and RDS</li><li>Jenkins, Groovy, Harness, Artifactory, Maven, or similar CI/CD pipelines related tools and technologies</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><em>If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume&nbsp;at </em><strong>anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com</strong><em>&nbsp;or call me at&nbsp;</em><strong>(925) 218-2347</strong><em>. Looking forward to hearing from you!</em></p>
